metadata.synopsis: The statues comment on the player's success in the insight puzzle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to S_WYR_InsightTest_Statue1_deebcb35-d6cc-4b1c-af44-929c1382d0ba in BGO_Main_A and destroy it.

0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_WyrmwayAnnouncer
0.text: An insightful decision. The tree of peace bore lasting fruit. Proceed.
